Reviews.Title: “No double beds”
Reviews.Author: tintbum
Reviews.Content: books 3 months arriving specifically stating double bed arrived 2 single beds stairs double bed 2 ppl desk isnt booked booked earlier didnt book 3 months ago double bed sheets singles join refused dbl beds 1 floor hotel 1 double bed floor dbl bed sheets chairs sit wither round table useless dont chairs sit sit bed time gym advertised coffee tea facilities internet computer broken dont rude ppl business stay else dont book night leave stuck 5 days hated hated attitude staff
